title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 

(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (commencement) (no 2) order 2020

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The 14th day of September 2020 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 14th day of September 2020 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous 
Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

subsections (1), (2) and (4) of section 5; 

section 23; 

section 24; 

(d) 

section 25. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 August, 2020. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 

Minister for Justice and Equality. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 18th August, 2020.
